lead_paragraph: Australia, the defending champion, defeated Sri Lanka by seven wickets in Grenada yesterday in a match between teams that had already qualified for the World Cup semifinals. Ricky Ponting, the Australian captain, and Andrew Symonds then scored unbeaten half-centuries to steer their team to 232-3 with 7.2 overs to spare.
